## HSF

HSF, Single molecule tracking of Heat Shot Factor in Drosophila, HSF is labeled with Halo tag. Data is a courtesy of Xiaona Tang. 

## HTZ1

HTZ1, Single molecule tracking of histone variant HTZ1 in fission yeast, HTZ1 is labeled with Halo tag. Data is a courtesy of Anand Ranjan.

## SWR1

SWR1, Single molecule tracking of histone variant HTZ1 chromatin remodelers SWR1 in fission yeast, SWR1 is labeled with Halo tag. Data is a courtesy of Anand Ranjan.
